prompt_base: photograph of a short, highly muscular martial arts monk, completely bald head, six distinct incense burn scars arranged in a triangle pattern on forehead, small nose, determined expression, wearing orange martial arts gi
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic lighting, hyperdetailed skin texture, subtle light reflection on the scars, defined muscles, realistic fabric texture
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, large nose, six dots missing, perfect skin, smooth head, helmet hair, flat lighting, low quality, plastic
